text: this is peter and i am an extreme
traveler 26 year old Peter
comes from Bratislava but I found him
here in his second home of Prague he
graduated college with a finance degree
but after six months of being in the
corporate world he realized that his
passion live in comedy and traveling so
he took a risk cut his salary and became
a video maker on YouTube now you might
be wondering what is so extreme about
Peter so far well this guy just enjoys
living life on the edge he's always had
this fascination for countries that most
people don't know about like Mauritania
the Gambia Benin Burkina Faso this will
be interesting so over the last two
years he went to these countries and
started filming the most bizarre things
possible you cannot imagine how hot and
humid it is right now I think I'm
getting dizzy
in Mauritania he jumped on a train
across the Sahara there's just
the iron orange fan
in Benin he bribe police officers with
giant snails but it worked they were
disgusting but it worked in Cameroon he
was caught in the middle of a civil war
that was probably the single scariest
moment of my life but one story that
almost had him on his death bed happened
in Togo I got malaria and it was a
severe malaria I feel extremely nauseous
like like a flu but ten times worse the
thing is I ignored the symptoms at first
and I ended up in a small a rundown
Hospital in a very small town in Togo I
got a malarek spasm which basically
means the red blood cells explode in
your system I was unable to breathe I
was sweating yellow sweat having
extremely high fever about an hour I
shed myself my pants and I literally
thought I was dying because nobody was
there to help me this is what could have
saved me when I got malaria when you go
to Africa drew buy these these may save
your life nowadays peter has turned his
bizarre lifestyle into a career being
the author of a best-selling book in
Slovakia the title is diff shot his son
is omen el which translates to all the
places where I didn't die it's about the
most extreme stories that happened to me
during my travels he has a popular show
on national TV and an ongoing
partnership with red Volvo vaakya every
time I'm about to procrastinate and I
see this I go back to work Peter is an
all-around awesome crazy and funny dude
who I hope I run into again Arai drew it
was nice meeting you but I'm on my way
to Burundi the world's poorest country
don't forget to take those malaria pills
